TopicTitle: Vostok 6 replica with ejector seat! Soviets launch first woman into orbit!---By AMRSD.

Articles.Content:
![mhqJtPo.png?2](http://i.imgur.com/mhqJtPo.png?2)

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Vostok-6)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/nRPac)

Enjoy, it took a long time to get this right ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) With working ejection seat!

And remember, I love seeing your screens of my crafts! Post them here! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113309-Applied-mad-rocket-science-division-%28TAKING-REQUESTS%29%28NOW-HIRING%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113309-Applied-mad-rocket-science-division-%28TAKING-REQUESTS%29%28NOW-HIRING%29)

![aM5099E.png](http://i.imgur.com/aM5099E.png)

![WgERTxo.png](http://i.imgur.com/WgERTxo.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T03:11:44Z" title="06/27/2015 03:11  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**
Great rocket. Isn't Vostok 1 the same as Vostok 6? Why not just make Vostok 1?

> 
> Great rocket. Isn't Vostok 1 the same as Vostok 6? Why not just make Vostok 1?

Yes, but because of Val I wanted to make it Vostok 6.
Omg you did the ejection seat I love it. Picture 6. What's that hanging off the spent stage?

> 
> Omg you did the ejection seat I love it. Picture 6. What's that hanging off the spent stage?

Oh, that's a weird thing where the fuel lines stay attached to the fuel tanks, kind of annoying, but not a problem. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This is great, love the ejector seat ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) also the newspaper.

> 
> This is great, love the ejector seat ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) also the newspaper.

Thanks! I wanted something unique for this craft ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Thanks! I wanted something unique for this craft ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also your R-7 rocket is epic too. R-7 is one of the more difficult rockets to build (I have tried many times to make a decent recreation and failed ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)) but it looks like you got it pretty good!

This thread also just reminded me of my Voskhod-2 recreation, had an airlock and everything, loved that ship but I don't have the save anymore ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> Also your R-7 rocket is epic too. R-7 is one of the more difficult rockets to build (I have tried many times to make a decent recreation and failed ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)) but it looks like you got it pretty good!
> This thread also just reminded me of my Voskhod-2 recreation, had an airlock and everything, loved that ship but I don't have the save anymore ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Thanks again! I'm really happy with the R-7, the only thing is that it changes diameter slightly about halfway up the first stage, where the tops of the boosters are, and mine doesn't have that, I couldn't get it to look natural.
Hey Mad Rocket Scientist, use a fairing over the main body to get the correct shape of the core stage, I think it works well!

> 
> Hey Mad Rocket Scientist, use a fairing over the main body to get the correct shape of the core stage, I think it works well!

That's a good idea, maybe I'll save that for v2, I like how the fuel tanks look. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Forgot to add this to OP when I posted:

And remember, I love seeing your screens of my crafts! Post them here! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Ooh, very nice to see this up and running! I'll be sure to give it a try when I get back.

Repped! You deserve it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Ooh, very nice to see this up and running! I'll be sure to give it a try when I get back.
> Repped! You deserve it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you!
Nice spacecraft,I have been trying to make an ejection seat since 0.21.

> 
> Nice spacecraft,I have been trying to make an ejection seat since 0.21.

It was the hardest part, I rebuilt it alt least 1 once. (Tip: use stack decouplers instead of radial decouplers. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif))

> 
> It was the hardest part, I rebuilt it alt least 1 once. (Tip: use stack decouplers instead of radial decouplers. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif))

I learned the hard way,which caused the death of several kerbals

Where from you got those launch towers? I would too like to get it, so, please send me a link from where I could download it! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, Neil\_Kerman said:
> 
> 
> Where from you got those launch towers? I would too like to get it, so, please send me a link from where I could download it! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")
> 

The launch towers are made out of stock parts.  You should be able to download the craft file and pull them off of the Vostok.  Good luck!
